i1.name: Living_Forge
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Ornn''' increases {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}} by 10% from all sources, further increased by 4% each time he upgrades a Mythic item into a Masterwork item.

{{sbc|Innate - Living Forge:}} '''Ornn''' can purchase non-[[Consumable item|consumable]] [[items]] from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a ''Forge Menu'' with his recommended items to select to be forged. {{tip|channel|Forging}} takes 4 seconds and the process is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} if '''Ornn''' takes damage from enemy {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|turret|turrets}}, disabling ''Living Forge'' for a few seconds. {{g|Gold}} is only expended upon completing the ''forge''.

{{sbc|Innate - Master Craftsman:}} When '''Ornn''' reaches level 13, the [[Item group#Mythic|Mythic]] item he owns or purchases is upgraded for free. Additionally, for each [[Experience (champion)|level]] after 13 (levels 14, 15, 16 and 17, excluding 18), '''Ornn''' can upgrade one of an allied champion's Mythic item by selecting them within 600 range. Each {{sbc|Masterwork}} item has roughly {{g|1000}}-worth of additional stats.
* {{sbc|Masterwork}} items:
** {{sbc|Assassin:}} {{ii|Draktharr's Shadowcarver}}, {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw}}, {{ii|Syzygy}}.
** {{sbc|Fighter:}} {{ii|Ceaseless Hunger}}, {{ii|Deicide}}, {{ii|Dreamshatter}}, {{ii|Infinity Force}}.
** {{sbc|Mage:}} {{ii|Caesura}}, {{ii|Eternal Winter}}, {{ii|Eye of Luden}}, {{ii|Icathia's Curse}}, {{ii|Liandry's Lament}}, {{ii|Upgraded Aeropack}}, {{ii|Vespertide}}.
** {{sbc|Marksman:}} {{ii|Bloodward}}, {{ii|Typhoon}}, {{ii|Wyrmfallen Sacrifice}}.
** {{sbc|Support:}} {{ii|Equinox}}, {{ii|Reliquary of the Golden Dawn}}, {{ii|Seat of Command}}, {{ii|Shurelya's Requiem}}, {{ii|Starcaster}}.
** {{sbc|Tank:}} {{ii|Forgefire Crest}}, {{ii|Rimeforged Grasp}}, {{ii|Turbocharged Hexperiment}}.
{{sbc|Innate - Temper:}} '''Ornn's''' [[basic attack]]s against {{tip|Brittle}} enemies {{tip|airborne|knock them back}} a short distance.

'''Ornn's''' and allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects against enemies with {{as|Brittle|critical strike chance}} will consume the debuff to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|type='''Ornn's''' level|10 to 18}} of their '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 250 against {{tip|monsters}}, and lasting 30% longer.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Ornn increases bonus armor, bonus magic resistance and bonus health by 10% from all sources, further increased by 4% each time he upgrades a Mythic item into a Masterwork item.
Innate - Living Forge: Ornn can purchase non-Consumable item items from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a Forge Menu with his recommended items to select to be forged. Forging takes 4 seconds and the process is interrupted if Ornn takes damage from enemy champions or turrets, disabling Living Forge for a few seconds. Gold is only expended upon completing the forge.
Innate - Master Craftsman: When Ornn reaches level 13, the Item group#Mythic item he owns or purchases is upgraded for free. Additionally, for each Experience (champion) after 13 (levels 14, 15, 16 and 17, excluding 18), Ornn can upgrade one of an allied champion's Mythic item by selecting them within 600 range. Each Masterwork item has roughly 1000-worth of additional stats. * Masterwork items: ** Assassin: Draktharr's Shadowcarver, Sandshrike's Claw, Syzygy. ** Fighter: Ceaseless Hunger, Deicide, Dreamshatter, Infinity Force. ** Mage: Caesura, Eternal Winter, Eye of Luden, Icathia's Curse, Liandry's Lament, Upgraded Aeropack, Vespertide. ** Marksman: Bloodward, Typhoon, Wyrmfallen Sacrifice. ** Support: Equinox, Reliquary of the Golden Dawn, Seat of Command, Shurelya's Requiem, Starcaster. ** Tank: Forgefire Crest, Rimeforged Grasp, Turbocharged Hexperiment.
Innate - Temper: Ornn's basic attacks against Brittle enemies knock them back a short distance.
Ornn's and allies' immobilizing effects against enemies with Brittle will consume the debuff to deal 10% âˆ’ 18% (based on level) of their maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 250 against monsters, and lasting 30% longer.
i1.notes:
* Items forged with ''Living Forge'' that grant health or mana items built in the field retain '''Ornn's''' previous {{as|health}} and {{as|mana}} percentage. Returning to base still brings health and mana items back to full.
* '''Ornn's''' basic attacks against {{tip|Brittle}} enemies will end the duration of the debuff [[on-hit]] prematurely even if the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} is not applied.
** His basic attacks against {{tip|Brittle}} epic {{tip|monster|monsters}} will still cause the debuff to be consumed and the bonus damage to be dealt, despite the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} not being applied against them.
* The reduction in {{tip|Tenacity}} will benefit all applicable types of {{tip|crowd control}}, not just {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}}. The following do not consume ''Brittle'' but benefit from the reduction: {{tip|blind|blinds}}, {{tip|cripple|cripples}}, {{tip|disarm|disarms}}, {{tip|ground|grounding}}, {{tip|silence|silences}}, and {{tip|slow|slows}}.
** ''Crowd control'' effects that are unaffected by ''Tenacity'' do not benefit from the reduction at all, which are {{tip|airborne}}, {{tip|drowsy}}, {{tip|nearsight}}, {{tip|stasis}}, and {{tip|suppression}}.
**  Although {{tip|airborne}} effects won't last 30% longer, if the spell simultaneously {{tip|stun|stuns}} the target, this stun will be extended and persist past the airborne duration, for an overall increased crowd control duration.
*** {{cai|Searing Charge|Ornn}} and {{ai|Call of the Forge God|Ornn}} each apply both airborne and stun simultaneously for the same duration for this reason.
* ''Living Forge's'' increase in {{as|'''bonus''' health}} {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with {{iis|Vigilant Wardstone}} {{sbc|Blessing of Ixtal}}.
* It is not required to rank {{ai|Bellows Breath|Ornn}} in order to apply ''Brittle''.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} inflicted by ''Brittle'' is credited to '''Ornn'''.
** The {{as|magic damage}} benefits from '''Ornn's''' {{sti|{{as|magic penetration}}}}.
* ''Mastercraft'' items and their components are not the same item and so in theory any unnamed passives would stack and any unnamed actives would only put themselves on cooldown upon activated. This is however not true. Actives will always place their counterpart on cooldown.
* {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|Spell shield}} interaction with '''Ornn's''' empowered attack against {{tip|Brittle}} targets.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Ornn''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
** All of '''Ornn's''' actions are disabled during the first {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the channel.
{{ct|channel|attack=interrupts|cast=interrupts|move=interrupts|items=interrupts,,, false|consume=interrupts|spells=interrupts|interrupts=death, silence|damage=true}}
* The following table shows a list of all {{sbc|Masterwork}} items and the additional stats they provide compared to their non-upgraded version, as well as the [[Gold efficiency|gold value]] of these stats: ([[Template:Ornn Masterwork items|edit]])
{{Ornn Masterwork items}}

q1.name: Volcanic_Rupture
description: {{sbc|Active:}}  '''Ornn''' slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind the first enemy champion struck, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within its path and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 2 seconds.
After {{fd|1.125}}-seconds, a magma pillar then erupts at its ending point, {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} enemies within and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
''The pillar will not expire while '''Ornn''' is {{ai|Searing Charge|Ornn|charging}}.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind the first enemy champion struck, dealing physical damage to enemies within its path and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.
After 1.125-seconds, a magma pillar then erupts at its ending point, knocking aside enemies within and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
The pillar will not expire while Ornn is Ornn's charging.
q1.notes:
* The fissure will move an 200 units beyond the first champion it hits, not exceeding the maximum range of the ability. ''It can still damage additional targets.''
* If launched in a wall, pillar will try to appear on the other side of the wall, if it cannot the pillar will be destroyed.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the {{tip|airborne|knock aside}} from the magma pillar forming.
{{Effect at cast time start}}

w1.name: Bellows_Breath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' marches in the target direction for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, gaining {{tip|displacement immunity}}, becoming {{tip|lockout|unable to act}}, and reducing his {{sti|movement speed|{{as|movement speed}}}} by 35% for the duration.
Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.15}} seconds to enemies within. The final gout of flame will apply {{tip|Brittle}} for 3 seconds.
''Bellows Breath'' has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to {{tip|minion|minions}}. {{tip|Monster|Monsters}} take modified damage as well.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn marches in the target direction for 0.75 seconds, gaining displacement immunity, becoming unable to act, and reducing his movement speed by 35% for the duration.
Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage every 0.15 seconds to enemies within. The final gout of flame will apply Brittle for 3 seconds.
Bellows Breath has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to minions. Monsters take modified damage as well.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|12 to 16}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{as|{{ap|12/5 to 16/5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}

{{st|Total Minimum/Minion Damage|{{ap|80 to 280}}|Minimum/Minion Damage Per Instance|{{ap|80/5 to 280/5}}}}
{{st|Total Monster Damage|{{ap|155 to 255}}|Monster Damage Per Instance|{{ap|155/5 to 255/5}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will negate the final instance of damage and prevents {{tip|Brittle}} from being applied.
* '''Ornn''' can see the on-target VFX on targets that are being struck even while they are in the [[Sight|fog of war]].
* '''Ornn''' places himself onto the ground and interrupts {{tip|airborne|displacements}} affecting him upon casting ''Bellow's Breath''.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Ornn''' is performing ''Bellows Breath'':

e1.name: Searing_Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|charges}} a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.

If '''Ornn''' collides with terrain during the charge, he creates a shockwave. The shock wave {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} nearby enemies, {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds, and deals damage to them if they weren't already hit during the charge.
The shockwave destroys the pillar formed by {{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn}} and partially destroys [[terrain]] created by enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn charges a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.
If Ornn collides with terrain during the charge, he creates a shockwave. The shock wave knocks up nearby enemies, stuns them for 1.25 seconds, and deals damage to them if they weren't already hit during the charge.
The shockwave destroys the pillar formed by Ornn's Volcanic Rupture and partially destroys terrain created by enemy champions.
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} may only block one instance of damage.
* {{tip|Brittle}} enemies without {{tip|Tenacity}} of their own will be {{tip|stun|stunned}} for a total of {{fd|1.625}} seconds.
* ''Searing Charge'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* '''Ornn''' will not {{tip|dash}} after the cast time if he is {{tip|airborne}} or {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}}.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will also resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
{{ct|cast|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 40% bonus armor) (+ 40% bonus magic resistance)

r1.name: Call_of_the_Forge_God
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' sounds his horn over the cast time, after which a lava elemental is summoned at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position for {{tt|3000 range|estimated}} at increasing speed, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. The {{tip|slow}} scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, down to a minimum of 10%.
''Call of the Forge God'' can be recast after {{tt|{{fd|1.25}}|Includes the cast time}} seconds while the elemental is active.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} 300 units in the target direction, though not through terrain. If '''Ornn''' collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction, dealing the same damage to enemies within its path and additionally {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second, reduced to {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the first enemy {{tip|champion}} hit.
Each pass applies {{tip|Brittle}} to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, after which a lava elemental is summoned at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position for 3000 range at increasing speed, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path and slowing them for 2 seconds. The slow scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, down to a minimum of 10%.
Call of the Forge God can be recast after 1.25 seconds while the elemental is active.
Recast: Ornn dashes 300 units in the target direction, though not through terrain. If Ornn collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction, dealing the same damage to enemies within its path and additionally knocking them up and stunning them for 1 second, reduced to 0.5 seconds after the first enemy champion hit.
Each pass applies Brittle to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125|175|225}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|250|350|450}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}{{st|Maximum Slow|{{ap|40|60|80}}%}}
r1.notes:
* Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** Despite this, the effects of both casts count as the same {{tip|cast instance}}.
* ''Call of the Forge God'' cannot be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* {{tip|Brittle}} enemies without {{tip|Tenacity}} of their own will be {{tip|stun|stunned}} for a total of {{fd|1.3}} seconds.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} may only block one pass.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will also resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
{{ct|cast}}
